subject: Doping (Sports)
Tests (Drug Use)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Martial Saug denied claims that Lance Armstrong tested positive for performance-enhancing drugs at the 2001 Tour de Suisse and that the results were covered up.
snippet: Martial Saug denied claims that Lance Armstrong tested positive for performance-enhancing drugs at the 2001 Tour de Suisse and that the results were covered up.
